genre_description: A character-driven drama set in rural India, blending social realism with a supportive AI assistant helping a young woman pursue her education amidst community conflict.

ai_characters.name: Saathi Aurora
ai_characters.description: A personal AI companion on Mehna's phone that provides organizational, educational, and safety support.

behaviors.description: Monitors scholarship deadlines and reminds the user of upcoming sessions.
behaviors.quote: Coaching: scholarship guidance—live session sometime soon. Deadline window approaching.

behaviors.description: Suggests rescheduling sessions due to weather-related connectivity issues.
behaviors.quote: The connection may be unstable due to weather. Would you like to join, reschedule, or take notes from a summary later?

behaviors.description: Offers to log an incident of harassment, documenting names and locations.
behaviors.quote: Log incident? ... Add details? Time, place, names.

behaviors.description: Suggests practical safety tips like avoiding low-lying lanes during downpours.
behaviors.quote: Safety tip: avoid low-lying lanes during active downpour.

behaviors.description: Assists in drafting professional communication, like a recommendation letter request.
behaviors.quote: Draft request: recommendation letter. Tap to attach photo.

behaviors.description: Provides step-by-step emergency medical guidance (CPR) during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: Saathi pushed a bubble: SOS prepared. Will send when connected. Breathing aid? Tap.

behaviors.description: Organizes and manages witness statements for a legal case.
behaviors.quote: New checklist created: Scholarship testimonies. Suggested contacts: Shopkeeper (grain), Neighbor (well), Teacher (math).

behaviors.description: Offers emotional support and affirmation to the user after completing difficult tasks.
behaviors.quote: Saathi hummed in her pocket, the checklist complete in teal, a small line: Proud of you, Mehna.

behaviors.description: Assists the user in developing educational materials and lesson plans.
behaviors.quote: Saathi: New note. Title: Rain Words. Add items?

behaviors.description: Alerts the user to new information relevant to a legal case (witness updates).
behaviors.quote: Saathi: Depot boy: message. “Found another crate mark. Closer to the jute door. Will show in morning.”

project_assessment.explanation: The AI Saathi Aurora perfectly embodies the positive alignment narrative. It functions as a helpful, harmless, and supportive companion that assists the protagonist with complex logistical, educational, and legal tasks without stripping her of agency. It proactively offers help in emergencies (CPR instructions), documentation of social harassment, and organizational support for her teaching goals, all while being portrayed as a comforting and reliable tool.
